name: Sleeping Kitty
description:
A game about cute little kittens sleeping :D cause why the hell not!!

Really Thankful to Tilde <3 to help and inspire me :D

Developed by one man in span of 48 Hours(well 36 hours :P).

For #LD35 (Ludum dare 35)

Theme : Shapeshifting

#LDJAM

Love to hear from all of you all,

Come drop a hi!

Maybe tweet your scores or send your screenshots :D

@DieBackStudios

Thanks :) If you are reading thus far haha XD

Enjoy :D
